bpi.most.client.utils.dnd

Class DNDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bpi.most.client.utils.dnd.DNDController

  • public class DNDController
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DNDController.
    Version:
    0.11a The Drag And Drop Controller. All Drag and Drop operations are passing through this controller. The Dragged widgets and elements are statically available, so it is possible to clear a panel during a drag operation and add the dragged item to a new, empty panel. The MOST DND functionality is based on Native GWT Drag and Drop. As this is still very error prone, there is no guarantee for MOST DND to work properly. So far, it has successfully been tested on chromium MOST DND uses an eventbus to fire and receive drag events all over the application. If a Drag event is fired the controller handles the highlighting process.
    Author:
    Stefan Glawischnig, Michael HÃ¶nisch
